title: Audio Lecture Schema
description: The Audio Lecture Archetype - Essential properties that define an audio lecture

_id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

primary_audio_archetype.description: Audio Archetype ID to use as the primary audio file of this audio book

additional_speaker.description: Additional people who assist in giving the lecture e.g. guest lecturers

institution.description: Institution where the lecture was given e.g. Harvard

department.description: Department the lecture belongs to e.g. Material Engineering

course.description: The specific course during which the lecture was given e.g. Principles of Nanotechnology

course_number.description: The specfic number of the course in which the lecture was delivered

lecture_date.description: Date and time the lecture was given in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

level.description: The level of knowledge required for the material discussed within the lecture

category.description: General category of the song, e.g. EDM

subcategory.description: Specific category of the song, e.g. Trance

tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record
